title: Hongyuan Securities
text: Hongyuan Securities Company Limited () is a leading <a href="securities">securities</a> firm <a href="headquartered">headquartered</a> in Beijing. It involves in the <a href="purchase">purchase</a> and <a href="Sales">sale</a> of <a href="stock">stock</a>s, <a href="funds">funds</a>, <a href="warrant%20%28finance%29">warrants</a> and <a href="Bond%20%28finance%29">bonds</a>, the underwriting and distribution of <a href="Initial%20public%20offering">IPO</a> stocks as well as the <a href="investment">investment</a> on financial <a href="assets">assets</a> and <a href="Derivative%20%28finance%29">derivatives</a>. It was established in 1993 and listed on the <a href="Shenzhen%20Stock%20Exchange">Shenzhen Stock Exchange</a> in 1994. It is the first securities firm listed on the stock exchange in China.
